name: Chris & Cosey
description: '''Chris & Cosey''', sometimes known as '''Carter Tutti''', are a musical duo formed in 1981, consisting of couple [[Chris Carter (British musician)|Chris Carter]] (electronics) and [[Cosey Fanni Tutti]] (voice, electronics, guitar, cornet), both previously (and as of 2020 the sole surviving) members of [[industrial music]] pioneers [[Throbbing Gristle]]. Since the release of their 1981 debut album ''Heartbeat'', the group have expanded on the rhythmic ideas of Throbbing Gristle while adding synthesized pop elements to their sound.
